com.rivelbop.rivelworks.graphics3d.shape

Class Sphere

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g3d.ModelInstance
      • com.rivelbop.rivelworks.graphics3d.shape.Shape3D
        • com.rivelbop.rivelworks.graphics3d.shape.Sphere
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g3d.RenderableProvider, com.badlogic.gdx.utils.Disposable

    public class Sphere
extends Shape3D
    An extension of the Shape3D class that creates a sphere.
    Author:
    Philip Jerzak (RivelBop)

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private int DIVISIONS
      Amount of divisions the model has, more = slower + better looking.
      private float RADIUS
      The radius of the sphere, same from all angles.

      • Sphere

        public Sphere(float radius,
              int divisions,
              com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.Color color)
        Creates a sphere by providing its dimensions and color.
        Parameters:
        radius - The radius of the sphere.
        divisions - The amount of divisions the sphere will have.
        color - The color of the sphere.

      • Sphere

        public Sphere(float radius,
              int divisions,
              com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.Texture texture)
        Creates a sphere by providing its dimensions and wrapping texture.
        Parameters:
        radius - The radius of the sphere.
        divisions - The amount of divisions the sphere will have.
        texture - The wrapping texture applied to the sphere.
